properties.name: April - June 2006
properties.description: Posted by Anever1136 se 29th ave, portland, or 97214noises that have woken me up here: construction across the street, neighbor\'s jam band, other neighbor throwing up, barking dog

properties.name: August 97 - May 99
properties.description: Posted by Anever3526 medina ave, columbus, ohleo bought his parents\' house and we all moved in there. spent most of this time experimenting with my alcohol tolerance. andrea and leo gardened and cooked and i fannied around acting fucked up and going out swing dancing. it\'s a nice house, they still live there.

properties.name: December 80 - May 95
properties.description: Posted by Anever4548 Gallery St, Gahanna, OH 43230my childhood home, a three bedroom ranch shared with my parents, three sisters, and an assortment of dogs, hamsters, snakes, birds, porcupines, and iguanas. my parents still live here.

properties.name: June 95 - September 96
properties.description: Posted by Anever51 e 11th ave, columbus ohmy first apartment. one day when i came home the kitchen ceiling had fallen to the floor. my car was broken into three times and hit twice. my boyfriend was arrested and thrown in jail. he had ferrets that stunk the place up. my neighbors were a drug dealer and a stripper, and we did prison tattoos for them and read their tarot cards. it\'s a parking lot now, and that\'s probably for the best.

properties.name: June 97 - August 97
properties.description: Posted by Anever656 thurber dr, columbus, ohthe first time i lived with andrea and leo. an apartment across the courtyard from the previous one. this allowed me the opportunity to get drunk while listening to my ex-boyfriend cavort with strippers in the pool. we wrote james brown lyrics on the sidewalk outside in chalk and had great margarita nights.

properties.name: June 99 - May 00
properties.description: Posted by Anever409 oak st apt a5, columbus, oh 43215best apartment ever, where i often woke up to pigeons cooing on my windowsills and there were scraps of zines in construction all over the floor. smelled like gesso. next door to the main library. i called it "my flat" like i thought i was in europe.

properties.name: September 96 - April 97
properties.description: Posted by Anever605 thurber dr, columbus, ohfull of cockroaches. i had a goddess altar in the corner of the living room and a cheesy electric fountain. i had my heart broken here and didn\'t get my security deposit back.

properties.name: june 00 - may 01
properties.description: Posted by Anever2432 summit st, columbus, ohlydia\'s house, which i shared with her, five cats, one dog, two rats, and for a while her ex-boyfriend. everything smelled like cat pee. the porch was perfect for getting drunk on. i hurt my foot in a car accident and spent many days limping from the bus stop to this house. it had the best interior paint ever.

properties.name: june 01 - may 02
properties.description: Posted by Anever3526 medina ave, columbus, oh2nd time living with andrea and leo, this time with zach as well. we lived upstairs and they called us "the punks." mainly all we did around this time was get tattoos and piercings. andrea and leo were watching a lot of world soccer.

properties.name: may 97
properties.description: Posted by Aneverlane ave & indianola ave, columbus, ohi lived here for a month with my friend ellen, who later changed her name to quinn. i had a little bird that kept me company. i was wearing overalls a lot and hated taking them down in the bathroom for fear cockroach babies would crawl all in them. we used to listen to the downstairs neighbors fighting and argued with the landlord over the faulty wiring.
